channel.title: Tennis on Victor Zheng
channel.description: Recent content in Tennis on Victor Zheng

item.title: Biography Tennis Club 2024
item.description: Here is the biography of me for the University of Toronto Tennis Club for 2023-2024. Victor Zheng has served as the UofT Tennis Club’s Head of Courts (21-22), Vice President (22-23), and President (23-present). Growing up, he was a badminton player. He never took up tennis until the age of 11, when he joined his brother at the UBC’s High-Performance Junior Tennis Training program, then coached by BC Champion Daniel Chu.
